segments.text: I see so many potential problems converging in this kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That continuously overflowing sink is truly worrying me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading across the floor creates a definite slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone, likely the woman, is bound to slip on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy's stool is just asking for a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so high up, reaching for those cookies, completely exposed to a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to think of the injuries or broken dishes that could result.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of the children's mischief is overshadowed by the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness for the peaceful morning that's about to be shattered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems on the verge of collapsing into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to just watch and not do anything to prevent it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is a perfect storm of domestic hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
